## contentExplorerPanelIds variable

List of all built-in panel IDs of the Content Explorer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
contentExplorerPanelIds: readonly[
    ('information',
    'general',
    'metadata',
    'history',
    'blueprint',
    'where-used',
    'view-on-site',
    'published-to',
    'translations')
];
```
